application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1. Malus (Apple Tree)Proposed Works: Reduce the crown by approximately 2-3m (40%) back to old pruning points. Retain hanging branches for privacy.Finished Height: Approximately 3-4m.Finished Width: Approximately 4-5m.Justification: Routine maintenanceT2. MagnoliaProposed Works: Remove basal and epicormic growth. Reduce the tree by 1-2m (30%). Trim back to ensure a 1.5m clearance from the streetlight.Finished Height: Approximately 4-5m.Finished Width: Approximately 4-5m.Justification: The works ensure safety by maintaining clearance around the streetlight, improve overall shape and size, and support the tree's health by removing epicormic growth.T3. Conifer (Rear Garden)Proposed Works: Reduce all around by 1-2m (30%) and trim to tidy.Finished Height: Approximately 4-5m.Finished Width: Approximately 3-4m.Justification: The reduction will contain the tree's size, prevent encroachment on adjacent properties, and improve aesthetics.T4. Portuguese LaurelProposed Works: Prune back by approximately 2-3m to appropriate pruning points while maintaining the shape.Finished Height: Approximately 4m.Finished Width: Approximately 3-4m.Justification: The works will manage the tree's size, maintain its shape, and prevent encroachment while ensuring the health and stability of the tree.T5. Cherry LaurelProposed Works: Prune back by 2-3m, reduce height by 3-4m, and trim to tidy.Finished Height: Approximately 3-4m.Finished Width: Approximately 3m.Justification: The works address size management, improve light penetration, and maintain the tree's structural health.T6. Laurel and ConiferProposed Works: Reduce height by 1-2m, prune back by 1m, and trim to tidy.Finished Height: Approximately 3-4m.Finished Width: Approximately 2-3m.Justification: Reduction and pruning are necessary to prevent overgrowth, improve appearance, and maintain manageable dimensions.T7. GinkgoProposed Works: Reduce the crown by approximately 1-2m (20%).Finished Height: Appr...
